WorkItem.Description:
Today I noticed this issue while using the toolkit.  I'm using the MVVM pattern in a UserControl sitting on a ModernDialog.  My ViewModel implements IDataErrorInfo and properties in my view have the ValidatesOnDataErrors binding flag.

When a field is invalid, the red border & message were not showing.  It turns out that wrapping my control in a AdornerDecorator fixes this issue.  

Validations work correctly in the ModernWindow.

I think this issue could be fixed by wrapping all ModernDialog content with an AdornerDecorator in the ModernDialog style.

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3676266/validation-errortemplate-not-showing-on-data-errors

Thanks for the toolkit!  It's great.  Looking forward to any forthcoming updates.
